post.body: Fo sho'! Guns just make everything better somehow. Especially big ones.
....... Mommy hold me, the girl with the big gun frightens me....
Awwww, that's harsh. I'm pretty sure the cutoff is 60 years, not 80.
My coworkers most enthusiastically agree with you.
It's part of my trifecta at work (Pandora, Slacker, Jango) and yet strangely all three seem to play mostly Air Supply. Hee.
I heard it on Pandora. =D
Ahhh, I'm not big on Aerosmith, though I started listening more when one of the singers came out for McCain. =)
*blank look*
Oooooo, sexy.
Oh stop what you're doing and start on something new. =P
It's not Sunday yet. =P
I see "with or without you" and I immediately see U2. *wails****** WoooOOowoooooooowoooo eeeeehhh waaawooooOOo....
That makes you DANGEROUS. =O
Oh good grief, I think I mixed up U2 with Human League. LOLOL
Oh my, will you give yourself away?
I'm lazy tonight. LOL (Re: Devo)
What can I say, I'm addicted to love in all it's forms. :*)
Sugar Pie Honey Bunch, how I missed you!!!!! I cried all day without your love. :~~~(
LOLOLOL
You need a bigger room! ROFL Puns are such a wonderful thing.
Bahahahahahahah!!!!!
We have a winner! ;-)
You raise a good point. =D
@IndyEnigma Dude, I tilted my head to the left and saw boobies. What did you expect from me? =P
True, especially General Hospital! =D Uh, not that I watch soap operas, I'm just saying IF I did, GH would rock my world!
It's so good to see you on Twitter again! I wubs you so much!!!
Or you can listen to me tweet and whine about my failed love life. You'll be out like a light in seconds. ;-)
I remember that show. It was hilarious. And then they kill them ALL off. That's just nuts.
... *sniff* I'll try... *sniffle snoo*
Ah man, no justice in this world. =P
Let's see, hot babes in bikinis, Hawaii, and no story at all. Sounds like a movie that has everything to me.
LOL =D
Owie.
G'night honey bunny!
You gotta sister who's just as bad as you? Inquiring minds would like to know for educational purposes.
That's one sexy popcorn. ;-)
Gasp you too? All these X-Files babes, oh my God... head... exploding... temperatures... rising... need... fire hose...
Me too! Except for the last few seasons when David Duchovny decided to be a weenie.
LOL
I pride myself for being as gay as a clown. ;-) But here I am wearing my heart like a crown, pretending you're still around.
I'd be ok with that if you were. I'm a male lesbian myself. ;-)
LOL, never shop when you're hungry. Lesson learned. ;-)
Mistletoe and Autumn Leaves are my favorite so far! I'm also partial to Blueberry Scones and Christmas Cookies! Mmmmmmm... =)
I prefer "nerd" though. It just sounds manlier. =D
Just a wee tad little bit I'm thinking. ;-)
it's all about style over substance. =X
Not really, Me and I aren't speaking to each other. =( I'm pretty ok with Myself though.
I have three BFFs! Me, myself, and I. ;-)
You know Second Life? I can see a point where all you had to do was put on glasses and you could live in a whole world. =O
Saw it, loved it. Wall-E reminded me of the Short Circuit robot too. =D
LOLz !
You know that cookie I gave you? I want it back now. =P
Everything's fuzzy now! *cries*
My eyes!!! My virgin eyes!!!
We take DMs here! Mastercards too. ;-)
No matter who wins that, you'll always be a Hot Mama to me. ;-)
Maybe it will come to me again in a dream. =D
Awww. =( They're not actually one of my top bands though. I'm more of a Chicago, Genesis kinda guy.
Here's my fave rendition of the song, Bruce Campbell style: http://tinyurl.com/2y52c6
I could make a shrink's career all by my lonesome. ;-)
Actually, i've been going to Starbucks for the hot chocolate. And I loved their holiday drinks too. =)
I think he's passed out somewhere, so no worries. =D
@AJae Jack is hotter than Sawyer in every shape and form and conceivable way. End of discussion.
it's a conpirnanriucy! (sorry I always have trouble spelling that word)
uuuhhhhh.....
I'm seeing two of everything now.
Sleeep, must sleeeeeeeep....
LOL
Oh noes!
LOL
Or a sign that I need a new job. =X
@pinkelephantpun is the hot fudge on my sundae.
Really? Awesome.
Just remember, wherever you go, there you are. ;-)
No, I'd have to use Bluetooth to bypass, and I'm not crazy about AT&T either.
Figures. *cries*
LOL, it just came on Pandora at work here. =D
What did you think of it in the meantime? iPhone killer or no? I might get one since I have Verizon, but I'm torn.
How is it? Does it compare well to the iPhone?
ROFL
I'm still stuck on the first season, LOL. I've been catching up on Netflix. =D
Methinks you might be right. ;-)
Don't blame ya, Jack's the man. =D
Does your Jesus smoke pot too?
Awww thanks, I appreciate that. =D
Oooooo new avatar! And looking HAWT too! *drool*
They're great novels if you can put up with the cussing. I just figured it was because Minnesotans were foul mouthed creatures. ;-)
no thats the character in the books, the author is John Sandford. =)
Mmmmmmm, grilled cheese. You know fi you add bacon it becomes Texan grilled cheese. =D
Really? LOL
ROFL
May the fleas of a thousand camels infest the armpits of the weenies at Best Buy, and may their arms be too short to scratch.
Awesome . =)
Make sure you have some hot chocolate tonight as you watch, and think of me. ;-)
Nah, I need a little more thickness than that. ;-)
LOL
What can I say, I like my coffee just the way I like my women: strong, white and sugary. ;-)
I hope that coffee comes with lots of cream and sugar! =D
AWESOME ;-)
Fo' sho' dude! =D
BOOYAH! And I'm still totally full of energy and could easily go another 24 h.... *thud*
LOLOL
Alright you want me to go hardcore? Poppy Seed Muffins then! BOOYAH
It's the blueberries! They make me tipsy!
I'll do my best to flail my arms and wail all the day long. ;-)
I was up till 4AM and got up at 12PM. Who's your Daddy? =D
Then why do young women shriek and run away when I tell them my age? That makes me sad.
Awww, you just have to learn to be around during magic hour. ;-)
LOL, gee I wonder why. ;-)
LOL, too funny!
They tax chocolate and its world war three. Seriously.
LOL
Doing that would actually clean UP the river some. ;-)
Oh great, don't share that with too many people or they'll start taxing that too!
Oh I'm sure. What discrimination too, our blind Obama-wannabe ween-ball is a fat-cist! #tcot
http://tinyurl.com/5zztl4 #tcot
I only had to shop for two people thankfully. =D
yeah that would not be cool at all. =X
Night!!
LMAO
Time to call Ghostbusters.
A victim of attending two liberal colleges here. Weird that in a campus pop. of several thousand, everyone knew who I was. ;)
LMAO!!!
LMAO
Be careful! And Merry Christmas my dear sister. =)
But it's Christmas!! =( *pouts*
Merry Christmas, cara mia. ;-)
Ahhh, memories. =)
OH YEAH
Now that's how ya do it! =D
Meeeeeeeeeeeeeeeerrrrrrrry Christmas!! =))))
LOL, yep, guns are just so much easier. I carry Mr. 9 Millimeter, who is sometimes accompanied by Twinkletoes 22. ;-)
Just another way for weenie twits to get on my nerves. =P
That might explain the nude dancing party I saw out in the parking lot.
LOL
LOLOL
Must.. leave... state... NOW
That's what I did, even though i secretly hope they break out in boils for the new year. Heathenist dingbats.
The only diversity I celebrate involves mixed martial arts. ;-)
I just said Merry Christmas in return (and secretly prayed that they break out in boils for the new year)
No, thankfully, though I'm still trying to keep myself from punching through the monitor.
LOL
Am I the only one who thought the phrase "I <3 you!" meant "I boobs you!" rather than "I heart you?"
I try to discooooover, a little something to MAKE ME sweeeeeteeeeeer! Oh baby refraaain, from breaking my heee... ♫ http://blip.fm/~115fl
Daddy says my love of Yankee Candles makes me gay. That's ok though, Daddy always says mean things like that when he's been drinking.
I once had 4,789 friends on Facebook. I only knew two of them.
Have I daaaaanced... iiiinside your eeeeeyes? How can I..... be reeeeeal? ...... ...... *BOINK BOINK*
Give me tiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiime, tooooooo realiiiiiiize my criiiiiiime... let me luuuuuurrrrv and steal.....
Dark in the city, night is a wire, steam in the subway, earth is afire, Do-do do do, do do do, do do do, do do do, do do! *growl*
They closed ALL the Starbucks that was on the route I take to work. What a load of crap.
Dear Facebook: I can't go for that, no can do... I can't go for being twice as nice, I can't go for just repeating the some old lines. =P
Hmmm, somebody found my blog by doing a Google search for "bimbo brakes." Odd.
I had a dream where I was on an island and John Locke was trying to find me a girlfriend. I think I've been watching too many Lost episodes.
Biggest full moon on tonight in 15 years! Any ladies want to join me in watching? Anyone? Anyone? ... ... ... *Mommy?*
Best Buy trademarked the phrase "You, Happier" ??? Yo BB, I got another one for ya: "You, Dumbasses"
Our esteemed blind moonbat of a governor decided that we should be taxed for regular soda (to encourage lardbutts to buy diet instead) #tcot
Ah man, my head feels like King Kong just used it for a seat rest. =X
I am a Christmas cookie, ready to go, only thing you have to do is POUR SOME SUGAR ON ME! OOH IN THE NAME OF LOVE - POUR SOME SUGAR ON MEEE!
Somebody actually wished me a "Solstice Salutations." *blink blink* Must... restrain... fist... of death...
